panDescriptor_t Struct Reference
[Route Under Mac (RUM)]

#include <mac.h>

Collaboration diagram for panDescriptor_t:

[legend]

Detailed Description

Defines the PAN descriptor for a received beacon frame.

The beacon parameters are stored in this structure

Definition at line 519 of file mac.h.

 Addressing modes from the beacon FCF.

 Short address of the node that sent the beacon.
